cast.overview: In postwar Japan, Godzilla brings new devastation to an already scorched landscape. With no military intervention or government help in sight, the survivors must join together in the face of despair and fight back against an unrelenting horror.
cast.title: Godzilla Minus One

details.biography: Touta Tawaragi (俵木 藤汰, Tawaragi Tōta, born November 29, 1962) is a Japanese actor and voice actor from Niigata Prefecture. He is affiliated with the Me & Her Corporation and the theater company Rappa-ya (Gekidan Rappa-ya). He is 169 cm tall, weighs 70 kg and has blood type O. He's been a meber of Rappa-ya since 1995.
details.name: Touta Tawaragi
